rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: An inviting entryway leading to a spacious living room with open-plan design. The area features natural lighting, eco-friendly materials, and large openings for cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed with energy-efficient appliances, sustainable cabinetry made from recycled or locally sourced timber, and incorporates Vastu-compliant placement ensuring prosperity. It features a central island to encourage family interaction.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, this dining area offers ample seating with ample natural light and access to both interior and exterior views, promoting healthy living.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with a dedicated balcony that provides natural ventilation and outdoor space. The room follows Vastu guidelines for comfort and tranquility.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Designed with water-saving fixtures, eco-friendly materials, and ample storage to promote sustainability while providing privacy.

openings.location: east-facing wall of the living area
openings.description: Large windows to maximize morning sunlight in accordance with Vastu principles and ensure natural ventilation.
Energy-efficient door design using recycled materials that complements the overall eco-friendly theme.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private balcony, designed to ensure privacy and tranquility. The room features energy-efficient lighting and natural ventilation aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A well-lit bedroom with dedicated balcony space for fresh air and relaxation. Uses eco-friendly materials and sustainable design practices.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom with a private balcony, ensuring ample outdoor access and following local architectural norms along with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A comfortable sleeping area that includes a spacious balcony. The design prioritizes natural ventilation and energy conservation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: The second master suite features an expansive private balcony, soundproofing, eco-friendly fixtures, and follows Vastu principles for enhanced privacy and energy flow.

openings.description: Windows designed to promote balanced sunlight exposure and cross ventilation while maintaining privacy.
Spacious balcony attached to every bedroom for outdoor living, natural light, and improved air quality.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A versatile green rooftop terrace featuring eco-friendly elements such as rainwater harvesting systems, solar panels for energy efficiency, and vegetation to maintain a low urban heat island effect. The design offers panoramic views and serves as an extension of living space.
